title: World Leaders Mull a Potential Second Term for Trump

title: As Many South Koreans Shun Marriage, Two Women Try to Redefine Family

title: France Parliament Re-elects Yaël Braun-Pivet for National Assembly President

content: As many as one-third of Venezuelans would consider migrating if the country’s authoritarian leader is given another six years in power in an election set for July 28, one poll showed.
